title: [BUG] Error decoding large byte array
body:
### Description

When I take a picture with my native iOS camera with iOS 16.6, when I try to decode the image it returns always null. It seems that the byte[] that I get from the image is around 2 million bytes. It used to be around 700000 bytes.
I upgraded the libraries to 2.88.5 and the problem persist!

### Code

```
using (var imageStream = new System.IO.MemoryStream(image))
{
var skData = SKData.Create(imageStream);
var BitmapSelected = SKBitmap.Decode(skData);
}
````


### Expected Behavior

_No response_

### Actual Behavior

_No response_

### Version of SkiaSharp

2.80.x (Deprecated)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

2.80.x (Deprecated)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (macOS)

### Platform / Operating System

iOS

### Platform / Operating System Version

iOS 16.4 and 16.6

### Devices

iPhone 14 Pro Max
